about_the_game:
Cavalry Clash - Bronze Chest

Contains items: Unbound Gold Coupons * 980, New Server Hero Gift Pack *5, Intermediate Experience Books * 20

(Note: This chest can be purchased multiple times in the game.)

Each New Server Hero Pack can choose one of the following rewards:

Zhao Yun Fragments * 10, Guo Jia Fragments * 10, Lu Bu Fragments * 10, Sun Ce Fragments * 10,

Guan Yu Fragments * 10, Zhang Liao Fragments * 10, Diao Chan Fragments * 10, Sun Shangxiang Fragments * 10.

name: Cavalry Charge - Bronze Chest

subs.option_text: 骑兵冲突-青铜宝箱 - $15.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti 4G
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6G
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Cavalry Clash - Bronze Chest Contains items: Unbound Gold Coupons * 980, New Server Hero Gift Pack * 5, Intermediate Experience Books * 20 (Note: This chest can be purchased multiple times in the game.)
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
